job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtdescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtits an exciting time to be at infoblox named a top cyber security company by the software report and one of ltemgtincltemgt magazines best workplaces for we are leading the way to nextlevel ddi with our secure cloudmanaged network services bringing nextlevel security reliability and automation to cloud and hybrid systemsall managed through a single pane of glass our success depends on bright energetic talented people who share a passion for building the next generation of networking technologiesand having fun along the wayltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for a senior software engineer to join our cloud engineering team in tacoma wa or austin tx reporting to the senior manager of software engineering in this role you will be a part of the team building saasbased applications and services powering infobloxs data lake and other nextgen platform components as part of the cloud engineering team you will have the opportunity to use the latest technology to deliver the core foundation for all infoblox applications you will also get the opportunity to work with the best of the technical and thought leadership team at infobloxltbrgtltbrgtyoure the ideal candidate if you are a strategic thinker who is driven to collaborate across teams operate independently and is deadline and resultsdrivenltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat youll doltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtjoin an agile saas team to design develop and maintain features and iteratively deploy services using infobloxs cloudbased architectureltligtltligtdesign and implement components of the next generation platform ampamp data lakeltligtltligtrecommend ways to improve system reliability efficiency and qualityltligtltligtwork closely with various crossfunctional product teamsltligtltligtstay current on key trends especially in the area of technologies and frameworks like kubernetes docker and elkprometheusltligtltligtbe responsible for key backend components of the platformltligtltligtdevelop rest and grpc apis as well as contribute to the overall api frameworkltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtwhat youll bringltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt years of experience in software development with programming languages such as python golang or javaltligtltligtindepth knowledge of linux system internals including boot network and storage subsystemsltligtltligtknowledge of protocols such as dhcp dns ntp and tcpipltligtltligtgood understanding of microservices architecture and containerbased softwareltligtltligtexperience in microservices development and containerbased software using docker and other container technologies is a huge plusltligtltligtexperience with amazon web services ec vpc elb s cloudformation etc is a plusltligtltligtgood exposure in application performance tuning memory management and scalabilityltligtltligtability to design highly scalable distributed systems using different opensource technologiesltligtltligtexperience building highperformance algorithmsltligtltligtbachelors degree in cs ce or ee is required and masters in cs ce or ee is preferredltligtltligtgood communication skills ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtwhat success looks likeltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtafter six months you willltbrgtltulgtltligtdevelop expertise in golangpythonltligtltligtlearn new skills related to cloud technologiesltligtltligtdevelop expertise in a microservices architectureltligtltligtimprove efficiency rate with completing projectsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtafter about a year you willltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligthave made a significant contribution toward backend developmentltligtltligthave made a significant contribution toward design and new ideasltligtltligtstart leading and taking ownership of the featureprojectltligtltligthave gained handson working experience and become an expert on docker and kubernetesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtweve got you coveredltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtour holistic ltstronggtbenefitsltstronggt package includes coverage of your health wealth and wellnessas well as a great work environment employee programs and company culture we offer a competitive
